name: plum
content:

a small, round fruit with a thin, smooth, red, purple, or yellow skin, sweet, soft flesh, and a single large, hard seed; the tree on which this fruit grows: plum jam a plum tree Grandad planted a lot of fruit trees, including gooseberry, blackcurrant, plum, and loganberry.
